abstract: Joe Drape On Horse Racing column notes that Kentucky Derby winner American Pharoah is on track to win Triple Crown, but feat will be more impressive if his top rivals Firing Line and Dortmund also race at Preakness and Belmont Stakes.
lead_paragraph: American Pharoah narrowly beat Firing Line and Dortmund at the Kentucky Derby, and having those other horses race at the Preakness would help push the Derby victor in the quest to capture the Triple Crown.

headline.main: Top Talent Makes for More Dazzling Triple Crown
headline.print_headline: Top Talent Makes for More Dazzling Crown

snippet: American Pharoah narrowly beat Firing Line and Dortmund at the Kentucky Derby, and having those other horses race at the Preakness would help push the Derby victor in the quest to capture the Triple Crown.
